title: 264：我们为什么能"嗅"到？
intro:
如果必须要放弃一种感觉，你会选嗅觉吗？当我们闻到一种味道的时候，大脑里到底发生了什么？人到底能闻到多少种味道？为什么有的人如此喜欢香菜味，有的人又讨厌到不行？我闻到的味道，真的和你闻到的是同一种味道吗？！


  


 
 
 Reference：
 
 
 Adipietro, K. A., Mainland, J. D., & Matsunami, H. (2012). Functional evolution of mammalian odorant receptors. PLoS genetics, 8(7), e1002821.
 
 
 Tobar, H. F., Moreno, P. A., & Vélez, P. E. (2009). Highly conserved regions in the 5’region of human olfactory receptor genes. Genet and Mol Res, 8, 117-128.
 
 
 Crowe, M. L., Perry, B. N., & Connerton, I. F. (1996). Olfactory receptor-encoding genes and pseudogenes are expressed in humans. Gene, 169(2), 247-249.
 
 
 Herz, R. (2016). The role of odor-evoked memory in psychological and physiological health. Brain sciences, 6(3), 22.
 
 
 Mainland, J. D., Keller, A., Li, Y. R., Zhou, T., Trimmer, C., Snyder, L. L., ... & Zhan, S. (2014). The missense of smell: ...
